About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself

After about fifteen years of working in the field of pension insurance, I reached a stage where I wanted to change my life and move into a field that really fascinates me - programming. I love the creativity in programming. As an autodidact I am very happy that in the world of programming I constantly have opportunities to learn, develop and improve.
